A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do yourself a very large favor...just watch the trailer for this movie over and over for 2.5 hours.  It is seriously better than sitting through this drivel.  This movie was terrible.  All of the best scenes and parts are condensed in the 2 minute promotion.  Save your money and watch that.  You'll be spared the useless SJW propaganda that occupies this so-called Star Wars film.
